pr_title: Override Clone, Equals, and hashcode for RPCStruct

timeline.message: Add copy, equals and hashcode methods to rpcstruct

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
clone.setBulkData(_bulkData);
clone.setBulkData(_bulkData);
clone.store = (Hashtable<String, Object>) store.clone();
